00021 #include "dispShape.hh"
00022 #include "uio.hh"
00023 
00024 #include <limits.h>

00026 #include <AIS_Shape.hxx>
00027 #include <AIS_DisplayMode.hxx>
00028 #include <Graphic3d_NameOfMaterial.hxx>
00029 #include <TopoDS_Shape.hxx>
00030 
00031 dispShape::dispShape( const TopoDS_Shape& shape,
00032                       const int lineNbr,
00033                       const Graphic3d_NameOfMaterial matl,
00034                       const AIS_DisplayMode mode):
00035                    NoM(matl), dMode(mode) {
00036   s = new AIS_Shape(shape);
00037   canLine = lineNbr;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void dispShape::display() {
00041   uio::context()->SetMaterial ( s, NoM, Standard_True );
00042   uio::context()->SetDisplayMode ( s,Standard_Integer(dMode),Standard_False );
00043   uio::context()->Display ( s );
00044 }
00045
